description:
Jump in, fall down, and race to the finish!

Fall Buddies is a fun and chaotic 3D platform racing game where timing, balance, and a bit of luck decide who reaches the goal first. Compete on colorful obstacle courses filled with moving platforms, spinning traps, and unexpected surprises.

Each level throws you into a fast-paced race where only the most focused (or the luckiest) players make it to the finish line. Jump over gaps, dodge rotating arms, keep your balance on moving platforms, and recover quickly when things go wrong. Falling doesn’t mean failure — you respawn instantly and jump straight back into the action.
With its cartoon visuals, playful physics, and lively atmosphere, Fall Buddies is easy to pick up and hard to put down. Perfect for quick sessions or long runs through increasingly challenging levels, the game stays fresh with new obstacles, environments, and surprises as you progress.

Key Features:

- Fast-paced obstacle course racing
- Simple and responsive controls
- Colorful, cartoon-style visuals
- Dynamic levels with moving hazards
- AI opponents with unpredictable behavior
- Checkpoints and quick respawns for nonstop action
- Progressively challenging stages across multiple themes

Run, jump, fall, laugh — and try again.
In Fall Buddies, every race is unpredictable, and every finish line feels earned.
